title: lock screen
body:
Allow XAML winRT apps to change the lock screen background.
Currently, this is only supported for silverlight :(

comments.body: This became a real problem for developers. As an example, my favorite weather app (it's not an app I developed, but I have similar cases in my own apps), weatherflow, justo got updated, and it seems the developer upgraded it to WinRT. The app per se is beautiful, but now I have to download a separate app, which does nothing but work as a lock screen provider.
